column-layout.p:
Quick Navigation right from the editor:
Go to declaration — navigates to where the function, variable or label in question is declared.
Go to symbol — navigates to any symbol in project code.

How often do you navigate back to the place you changed last? PhpStorm always tracks your changes so all you have to do is press Ctrl + Shift + Backspace, and you will find yourself transported back to that location.
Find/Highlight Usages locates other places in your entire project where a given symbol is used, with quick preview and navigation to the actual usages:
Develop PHPUnit tests, run tests quickly from directory, file or class and examine their results in the IDE.
